original_text: So the Lord has become angry with his people. He is ready to punish them. He has lifted up his hand, so that the mountains shake. Dead bodies of people are lying all over the streets. But that is not enough! The Lord is still angry with them. His hand is ready to punish them even more.
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 자기 백성에게 노를 발하시고 그들 위에 손을 들어 그들을 치신지라 산들은 진동하며 그들의 시체는 거리 가운데에 분토 같이 되었도다 그럴지라도 그의 노가 돌아서지 아니하였고 그의 손이 여전히 펼쳐져 있느니라

sentences.original_text: So the Lord has become angry with his people
He is ready to punish them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 벌할 준비가 되어 있다

sentences.original_text: He has lifted up his hand
Dead bodies of people are lying all over the streets
The Lord is still angry with them
His hand is ready to punish them even more
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손은 그들을 더욱 벌할 준비가 되어 있다
